TopicTitle: I guess its about time I join the Forums

Articles.Content: I've been playing this game 3 years after my friend told me to get it, I am convinced this is the best early access game ever created. We play our version of multi-player (we are excited about Squads descition to add full multi-player we've been saying it need it for a while) where we talk on skype and will share screen and show the other person our ideas, test, success and, failures. We both got KSP from their site and in the last year or so switched to Steam so I auto-updates. I am studying astrophysics as my biggest passion is everything dealing with space. I look forward to sharing Ideas with everyone and being apart of the forums!
Welcome aboard glad to have you here, happy Kerbaling
